HttpClientName.description: The name of the HttpClient to use for downloading image assets.

UpstreamImageAssetBaseUri.description: Upstream base URI from which to retrieve image assets.

UpstreamImageRetrievalTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for retrieving image assets from the upstream base URI.

EnableBase64Cache.description: Whether to enable in-memory caching of Base64 strings representing images.

NoExpiry.description: Whether to disable expiry of cached Base64 strings.

Base64CacheExpiryMinutes.description: Number of minutes until cached Base64 strings expire and are refreshed from the upstream URI.

LoggingCorrelationIdentifier.description: Structured logging 'key' to use for logging correlation.
